question: When was the Twenty point program launched?
explanation: The Twenty Point Programme was initially launched by Prime Minister Indira Gandhi in 1975 during the 5th five-year plan(1975-78). It was restructured 3 times in 1982,1986, and 2006. The basic objective of the 20-Point Programme is to eradicate poverty and to improve the quality of life of the poor and the underprivileged population of the country.
